resources.string: Every state has different laws for whether or not you can record others without their consent. Please read and understand the relevant recording law for your state, as usage of this app can violate these recording laws and you may face charges. By agreeing to the EULA, you have acknowledge that you will only use this app where legal, and understand developers cannot be help accountable.

If you are experiencing an emergency, please dial 911 immediately. If you were recently attacked, pleas consider these next steps to get help and press charges:
 - File a police report with your local authorities
 - Gather any additional evidence
 - Reach out to loved ones for support
 - National Sexual Assault Hotline
 - National Domestic Violence Hotline
Users must agree to the EULA to use this app. You can review this EULA here.
